::Hunter::

Hunter could tell by his scanner reports that the bot had crossed the 
channel. He smiles at the report of three other Predacons in the area.

"Four Preds, eh?" he says to himself, "Well, the more the merrier."

Two shoulder cannons flip over his shoulders to take positions near 
his head. He takes another rifle, and his optics power up for optic 
blasts. He powers his boosters and flies up, clearing the trees and 
flying forward untill Scorponok was visible.

"Time to meet your maker, Predacon!" Hunter yells as he flies 
forward. His shoulder cannons fire two signature-seeking missiles 
each at Scorponok, and both his rifles unleas a barrauge of laser 
shots, also aimed at Pred.




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Robert Dahl <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Scorponok starts to near the Island of london. The trip across the 
channel
> had calmed his nerves. He started to excite the water, as it 
trickled down
> his body he opened his comm link again. "Okay, Drill Bit, Darkfate. 
I have
> arrived in london. I am now scanning for the base."
